text: @realDonaldTrump Nancy @SpeakerPelosi, 3rd in line for presidency, and knowing full well the #Coronavirus risks facing #America, was videotaped in San Francisco on Feb 24 2020 playing the role of the mayor in Jaws telling everyone it’s safe to enter the waters. https://t.co/BE9mtwWDck
